environment.informationsSenderAndReceipe: Please note that the two mail addresses must be different.
environment.alertSenderAndReceipe: Mail not sent: you have entered the same mail address twice.

environment.siUnChampVide: If a field is empty, the script won't be included in the website.
environment.ccCodeChat: Copy-Paste the code given by Zendesk or another chat client,
environment.overrideSendTo: For test only : Override recipient (empty to ignore)
environment.dlAllDocumentInfo: * Download only this documents : products, medias/galleries/slider, documents
environment.uploadAllDocumentInfo: * Only .zip is accepted, and must contain good folders (available in download). No entry in the database.
environment.redirect: Back-office is accessible at this address (you will be redirected) :
environment.defaultImageTips: When the image does not exist, display this image instead. Only disk path are allowed (no URL)
environment.billsVariables: Available variables : {year} for the current year and {numAuto} for an autoincremented number. Example : MYSITE_{year}_{numAuto}
environment.errorCheckInfo: An error has occurred. Please check the connection information to the mail server.

import.modifyRobot: The robot.txt file has been modified.

path.mediaHelper: Leave empty to have the default folder (/uploads). For a specific folder, a relative path is required
